Hypotheses:
n, m: nat

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Qed.```

```coq
intros m nms Hm Hnms.
assert (Htot_map_name_injective : forall n1 n2 : name, tot_map_name n1 = tot_map_name n2 -> n1 = n2).
{ intros n1 n2 Heq.
  apply (proj1 (MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective_tot_map_name_inv_inverse name_map_bijective)) in Heq.
  rewrite Heq.
  reflexivity.
}

assert (Htot_map_msg_injective : forall m1 m2 : msg, tot_map_msg m1 = tot_map_msg m2 -> m1 = m2).
{ intros m1 m2 Heq.
  apply (proj1 (MultiParamsMsgTotalMap_tot_map_msg_inv_inverse msg_map)) in Heq.
  rewrite Heq.
  reflexivity.
}

assert (Hnms' : NoDup (map (fun nm : name * msg => (tot_map_name (fst nm), tot_map_msg (snd nm))) nms)).
{ apply NoDup_map_snd_fst.
  - exact Hnms.
  - intros nm1 nm2 Hnm1 Hnm2 Heq.
    apply Htot_map_msg_injective.
    rewrite <- Heq.
    f_equal.
    apply Htot_map_name_injective.
    rewrite <- Heq.
    f_equal.
}

exact Hnms'.
Qed.

original: intros m nms Hm Hnms. assert (Htot_map_name_injective : forall n1 n2 : name, tot_map_name n1 = tot_map_name n2 -> n1 = n2). { intros n1 n2 Heq. apply (proj1 (MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective_tot_map_name_inv_inverse name_map_bijective)) in Heq. rewrite Heq. reflexivity. } assert (Htot_map_msg_injective : forall m1 m2 : msg, tot_map_msg m1 = tot_map_msg m2 -> m1 = m2). { intros m1 m2 Heq. apply (proj1 (MultiParamsMsgTotalMap_tot_map_msg_inv_inverse msg_map)) in Heq. rewrite Heq. reflexivity. } assert (Hnms' : NoDup (map (fun nm : name * msg => (tot_map_name (fst nm), tot_map_msg (snd nm))) nms)). { apply NoDup_map_snd_fst. - apply Hnms. - intros nm1 nm2 Hnm1 Hnm2 Heq. apply Htot_map_msg_injective. rewrite <- Heq. f_equal. apply Htot_map_name_injective. rewrite <- Heq. f_equal. } apply Hnms'.
